name: Pufferfish Attack!
description:
You were out enjoying your cruise until you heard a loud crack from under the hull of the boat. You tilt your head to get a clear view of whats happening in the water. Pufferfish are attacking your boat!

In this ocean themed shooter, rev your engines and load your cannon; it's time to go to war with the belligerent pufferfish!

Points are awarded for distance, pufferfish killed, and time.

Instructions: Hold space to move forward. Use the mouse to aim. Click to shoot, but you cannot shoot while moving! Press Q to bring you to the game over screen.
